Mac users on High Sierra and later can use a built-in system tool. 

$ sudo /usr/libexec/firmwarecheckers/eficheck/eficheck --save -b firmware.bin

To scrub the privacy-sensitive bits:
$ sudo /usr/libexec/firmwarecheckers/eficheck/eficheck --cleanup -b firmware.bin
